protein.specific_function: Dehydrogenase that mediates the formation of 2,5-dihydroxybenzoic acid (2,5-DHBA), a siderophore that shares structural similarities with bacterial enterobactin and associates with LCN2, thereby playing a key role in iron homeostasis and transport. Also acts as a 3-hydroxybutyrate dehydrogenase (By similarity).

pathway.name: Synthesis and degradation of ketone bodies

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the CH-CH group of donors, NAD or NADP as acceptor
